data.partBlankContent: For this reason it is important that the root account in particular never have a period in its PATH variable. data.fullContent: For this reason it is important that the root account in particular never have a period in its PATH variable. Note that if the value of the PATH variable begins or ends with a period, the system will treat this just like a period. So, in addition, the root PATH variable should never begin or end with a colon, or have two colons next to each other with no directory in between. In any event it is often preferable for the System Administrator to type in the full command path rather than relying on the system.
data.answer: 因此，根帐户的PATH变量中永远不要有句点是非常重要的。注意，如果PATH变量的值以句点开始或结束，系统将将其视为句点。因此，根路径变量不应该以冒号开始或结束，也不应该有相邻的冒号，但中间没有目录。在任何情况下，系统管理员最好输入完整的命令路径，而不是依赖于系统。
